Five kids orphaned after virus kills parents

A mother and father whose lives were taken by COVID-19 within hours of each other have left behind five underage children.

Wall Street plummets as fears return

Wall Street has plummeted as investors reacted to renewed fears of a pandemic resurgence, with the worst one-day drop since March 16.

Parents finally meet surrogate babies

Eight emotional couples have been able to meet their surrogate-born babies in Ukraine for the first time, after borders were shut during the coronavirus pandemic.
